newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 16 muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 16 muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp said Thursday it qualified for bond insurance the following 16 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today:
--Y/S School Facility Finance Authority, Calif., $19.25 million special tax bonds, by direct purchase.
--Allegan County, Mich., $1.14 million water supply system revenue bonds.
--Livingston County, Mich., $4.675 million sewer disposal system bonds.
--Big Lake Independent School District No 727, Minn., $11.26 million GOs.
--Kansas City, Mo., $29.415 million airport revenue bonds.
--Amsterdam City School District, N.Y., $1.4 million GOs.
--Phoenix Central School District, N.Y., $2.99 million school general obligation bonds.
--Rensselaer Central School District, N.Y., $8.05 million school district GOs.
--Longview, Texas, $8 million tax and revenue bonds.
--Virginia Housing Development, $21.225 million multi-family housing alternative minimum tax bonds.
--Virginia Housing Development, $30.6 million multi-family housing taxable bonds.
--Greenbrier County Board of Education, W.Va., $8 million school bonds.
